trans-unit.source: .NET Core Application Deployment
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 應用程式部署

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Application Deployment
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 應用程式部署

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core, .NET Core deployment
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core、.NET Core 部署

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Application Deployment
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 應用程式部署

trans-unit.source: You can create two types of deployments for .NET Core applications:
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立兩種類型的 .NET Core 應用程式部署︰

trans-unit.source: Framework-dependent deployment.
trans-unit.target: 與 Framework 相依的部署。

trans-unit.source: As the name implies, framework-dependent deployment (FDD) relies on a shared system-wide version of .NET Core to be present on the target system.
trans-unit.target: 正如其名，與 Framework 相依的部署 (FDD) 要仰賴全系統共用的 .NET Core 版本才能存在於目標系統上。

trans-unit.source: Because .NET Core is already present, your app is also portable between installations of .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 因為 .NET Core 已存在，所以應用程式也可以在 .NET Core 安裝之間攜帶。

trans-unit.source: Your app contains only its own code and any third-party dependencies that are outside of the .NET Core libraries.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式僅包含其自有程式碼和 .NET Core 程式庫以外的所有協力廠商相依性。

trans-unit.source: FDDs contain .dll files that can be launched by using the [dotnet utility](../tools/dotnet.md) from the command line.
trans-unit.target: FDD 包含的 .dll 檔案，可以使用 [dotnet 公用程式](../tools/dotnet.md)從命令列啟動。

trans-unit.source: For example, `dotnet app.dll` runs an application named `app`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`dotnet app.dll` 執行名為 `app` 的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Self-contained deployment.
trans-unit.target: 自封式部署。

trans-unit.source: Unlike FDD, a self-contained deployment (SCD) does not rely on any shared components to be present on the target system.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 FDD，自封式部署 (SCD) 不仰賴任何共用的元件就能存在於目標系統上。

trans-unit.source: All components, including both .NET Core libraries and the .NET Core runtime, are included with the application and are isolated from other .NET Core applications.
trans-unit.target: 所有的元件，包括 .NET Core 程式庫和 .NET Core 執行階段，都隨附於應用程式，並與其他 .NET Core 應用程式隔離。

trans-unit.source: SCDs include an executable (such as `app.exe` on Windows platforms for an application named `app`), which is a renamed version of the platform-specific .NET Core host, and a .dll file (such as `app.dll`), which is the actual application.
trans-unit.target: SCD 包含可執行檔 (例如，Windows 平台上 `app` 應用程式的 `app.exe`)，這是重新命名的特定平台 .NET Core 主應用程式版本，以及實際的應用程式 .dll 檔案 (例如 `app.dll`)。

trans-unit.source: Framework-dependent deployments (FDD)
trans-unit.target: 與 Framework 相依的部署 (FDD)

trans-unit.source: For an FDD, you deploy only your app and any third-party dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 在 FDD，您只要部署自己的應用程式和任何協力廠商相依性。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to deploy .NET Core, since your app will use the version of .NET Core that's present on the target system.
trans-unit.target: 您不必部署 .NET Core，因為您的應用程式會使用存在於目標系統上的 .NET Core 版本。

trans-unit.source: This is the default deployment model for .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: 這是 .NET Core 應用程式的預設部署模型。

trans-unit.source: Why create a framework-dependent deployment?
trans-unit.target: 為何建立與 Framework 相依的部署？

trans-unit.source: Deploying an FDD has a number of advantages:
trans-unit.target: 部署 FDD 有許多優點︰

trans-unit.source: You do not have to define the target operating systems that your .NET Core app will run on in advance.
trans-unit.target: 您不必事先定義 .NET Core 應用程式執行所在的目標作業系統。

trans-unit.source: Because .NET Core uses a common PE file format for executables and libraries regardless of operating system, .NET Core can execute your app regardless of the underlying operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由於不論作業系統為何，.NET Core 對可執行檔和程式庫都使用通用的 PE 檔案格式，所以 .NET Core 可以執行您的應用程式，不理會基礎作業系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the PE file format, see [.NET Assembly File Format](../../standard/assembly-format.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需 PE 檔格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Assembly File Format](../../standard/assembly-format.md) (.NET 組件檔案格式)。

trans-unit.source: The size of your deployment package is small.
trans-unit.target: 部署套件的大小很小。

trans-unit.source: You only have to deploy your app and its dependencies, not .NET Core itself.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要部署您的應用程式及其相依性，不用部署 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Multiple apps use the same .NET Core installation, which reduces both disk space and memory usage on host systems.
trans-unit.target: 多個應用程式使用相同的 .NET Core 安裝，這樣可減少主機系統的磁碟空間和記憶體使用量。

trans-unit.source: There are also a few disadvantages:
trans-unit.target: 另外還有幾個缺點︰

trans-unit.source: Your app can run only if the version of .NET Core that you target, or a later version, is already installed on the host system.
trans-unit.target: 只有主機系統安裝了目標的 .NET Core 版本或更新版本，您的應用程式才能執行。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for the .NET Core runtime and libraries to change without your knowledge in future releases.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 執行階段和程式庫在未來的版本中可能有所變更，但不會通知您。

trans-unit.source: In rare cases, this may change the behavior of your app.
trans-unit.target: 只有極其罕見的情況，才可能變更應用程式的行為。

trans-unit.source: Deploying a framework-dependent deployment
trans-unit.target: 部署與 Framework 相依的部署

trans-unit.source: Deploying a framework-dependent deployment with no third-party dependencies simply involves building, testing, and publishing the app.
trans-unit.target: 部署無任何協力廠商相依性的 Framework 相依部署，只涉及建置、測試和發行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A simple example written in C# illustrates the process.
trans-unit.target: 以 C# 撰寫的簡單範例會說明此程序。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the [dotnet utility](../tools/dotnet.md) from the command line; however, you can also use a development environment, such as Visual Studio or Visual Studio Code, to compile, test, and publish the example.
trans-unit.target: 此範例從命令列使用 [dotnet 公用程式](../tools/dotnet.md)，但您也可以使用開發環境，例如 Visual Studio 或 Visual Studio Code，來編譯、測試及發行範例。

trans-unit.source: Create a directory for your project, and from the command line, type [dotnet new](../tools/dotnet-new.md) to create a new C# console project.
trans-unit.target: 建立專案目錄，並從命令列輸入 [dotnet new](../tools/dotnet-new.md) 來建立新的 C# 主控台專案。

trans-unit.source: Open the `Program.cs` file in an editor, and replace the auto-generated code with the following code.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯器中開啟 `Program.cs` 檔案，並以下列程式碼取代自動產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It prompts the user to enter text, and then displays the individual words entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 它會提示使用者輸入文字，然後顯示使用者輸入的個別文字。

trans-unit.source: It uses the regular expression `\w+` to separate the words in the input text.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用規則運算式 `\w+` 分隔輸入文字中的字詞。

trans-unit.source: Run the [dotnet restore](../tools/dotnet-restore.md) command to restore the dependencies specified in your project.
trans-unit.target: 執行 [dotnet restore](../tools/dotnet-restore.md) 命令還原專案中指定的相依性。

trans-unit.source: Create a debug build of your app by using the [dotnet build](../tools/dotnet-build.md) command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [dotnet build](../tools/dotnet-build.md) 命令建立應用程式的偵錯組置。

trans-unit.source: After you've debugged and tested the program, you can create the files to be deployed with your app by using the `dotnet publish -f netcoreapp1.0 -c release` command.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯並測試程式之後，您可以使用 `dotnet publish -f netcoreapp1.0 -c release` 命令建立要隨應用程式一起部署的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This creates a release (rather than a debug) version of your app.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立應用程式的發行 (而非偵錯) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The resulting files are placed in a directory named `publish` that is in a subdirectory of your project's `.\bin\release\netcoreapp1.0` subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案會放在名為 `publish` 的目錄中，位在您專案的 `.\bin\release\netcoreapp1.0` 子目錄的子目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Along with your application's files, the publishing process emits a program database (.pdb) file that contains debugging information about your app.
trans-unit.target: 隨著應用程式檔案一起，發佈程序會發出程式資料庫 (.pdb) 檔案，其中包含應用程式的偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: The file is useful primarily for debugging exceptions; you can choose not to package it with your application's files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案主要用於偵錯例外狀況，您可以選擇應用程式檔案不封裝它。

trans-unit.source: The complete set of application files can be deployed in any way you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 整組應用程式檔案可以任何您想要的方式部署。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can package them in a zip file, use a simple `copy` command, or deploy them with any installation package of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用簡單的 `copy` 命令將它們封裝在 zip 檔案中，或與您選擇的任何安裝封裝一起部署。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the application binaries, the installer should also either bundle the shared framework installer or check for it as a prerequisite as part of the application installation.
trans-unit.target: 除了應用程式二進位檔外，安裝程式也應該配套共用的 Framework 安裝程式，或勾選為必要條件當成應用程式安裝的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Installation of the shared framework requires Administrator/root access since it is machine-wide.
trans-unit.target: 共用 Framework 安裝需要系統管理員/根目錄存取權，因為它要通行全機器。

trans-unit.source: Deploying a framework-dependent deployment with third-party dependencies
trans-unit.target: 部署具有協力廠商相依性的 Framework 相依部署

trans-unit.source: Deploying a framework-dependent deployment with one or more third-party dependencies involves three additional steps before you can run the `dotnet restore` command:
trans-unit.target: 部署具有一或多個協力廠商相依性的 Framework 相依部署，包含三個額外的步驟，然後才能執行 `dotnet restore` 命令︰

trans-unit.source: Add references to any third-party libraries to the `dependencies` section of your `project.json` file.
trans-unit.target: 將任何協力廠商程式庫參考加入您 `project.json` 檔案的 `dependencies` 區段。

trans-unit.source: The following `dependencies` section uses Json.NET as a third-party library.
trans-unit.target: 下列 `dependencies` 區段會使用 Json.NET 當成協力廠商程式庫。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't already, download the NuGet package containing the third-party dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未如此做，請下載包含協力廠商相依性的 NuGet 封裝。

trans-unit.source: To download the package, execute the `dotnet restore` command after adding the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 若要下載封裝，請在加入相依性後執行 `dotnet restore` 命令。

trans-unit.source: Because the dependency is resolved out of the local NuGet cache at publish time, it must be available on your system.
trans-unit.target: 因為相依性是在發行時於本機 NuGet 快取外解析，所以必須能在系統中取得。

trans-unit.source: Note that a framework-dependent deployment with third-party dependencies will only be as portable as its third-party dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，具有協力廠商相依性的 Framework 相依部署，可攜性只與其協力廠商相依性一致。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a third-party library only supports macOS, the app will not be portable to Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果協力廠商程式庫只支援 macOS，則應用程式就無法攜至 Windows 系統。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if the third-party dependency itself depends on native code.
trans-unit.target: 如果協力廠商相依性本身依賴於原生程式碼，就可能發生這種情況。

trans-unit.source: A good example of this is Kestrel server.
trans-unit.target: Kestrel 伺服器即是一個好例子。

trans-unit.source: When an FDD is created for an application with this kind of third-party dependency, the published output will contain a folder for each [Runtime Identifier (RID)](../rid-catalog.md#what-are-rids) that the native dependency supports (and that exists in its NuGet package).
trans-unit.target: 當具有這類協力廠商相依性的應用程式建立了 FDD 時，已發行輸出就會包含原生相依性支援的每個 [執行階段識別碼 (RID)](../rid-catalog.md#what-are-rids) 資料夾 (存在其 NuGet 封裝中)。

trans-unit.source: Self-contained deployments (SCD)
trans-unit.target: 自封式部署 (SCD)

trans-unit.source: For a self-contained deployment, you deploy not only your app and any third-party dependencies, but the version of .NET Core that you build your app with.
trans-unit.target: 針對自封式部署，您不僅要部署自己的應用程式和所有協力廠商相依性，還要部署建置應用程式所用的 .NET Core 版本。

trans-unit.source: Creating an SCD does not, however, include the [native dependencies of .NET Core](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/Documentation/prereqs.md) itself on various platforms (for example, OpenSSL on macOS) so these need to be installed before running the application.
trans-unit.target: 不過，建立 SCD 不包含各種平台上的 [.NET Core 原生相依性](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/Documentation/prereqs.md)本身在 (例如，macOS 上的 OpenSSL)，所以您要先安裝這些，才能執行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Why deploy a Self-contained deployment?
trans-unit.target: 為什麼要部署自封式部署？

trans-unit.source: Deploying a Self-contained deployment has two major advantages:
trans-unit.target: 部署自封式部署有兩大優點︰

trans-unit.source: You have sole control of the version of .NET Core that is deployed with your app.
trans-unit.target: 您可以獨家控制隨應用程式部署的 .NET Core 版本。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core can be serviced only by you.
trans-unit.target: 只有您可以提供 .NET Core 服務。

trans-unit.source: You can be assured that the target system can run your .NET Core app, since you're providing the version of .NET Core that it will run on.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保證目標系統能執行您的 .NET Core 應用程式，因為您提供的是它可以執行的 .NET Core 版本。

trans-unit.source: It also has a number of disadvantages:
trans-unit.target: 它也有一些缺點︰

trans-unit.source: Because .NET Core is included in your deployment package, you must select the target platforms for which you build deployment packages in advance.
trans-unit.target: 因為 .NET Core 包含在您的部署套件中，所以您必須事先選取部署套件建置所在的目標平台。

trans-unit.source: The size of your deployment package is relatively large, since you have to include .NET Core as well as your app and its third-party dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您的部署套件的大小相當大，因為您必須包含 .NET Core 以及應用程式及其協力廠商相依性。

trans-unit.source: Deploying numerous self-contained .NET Core apps to a system can consume significant amounts of disk space, since each app duplicates .NET Core files.
trans-unit.target: 將多個自封式 .NET Core 應用程式部署到系統，會消耗大量的磁碟空間，因為每個應用程式都會重複 .NET Core 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Deploying a simple self-contained deployment
trans-unit.target: 進行簡單的自封式部署

trans-unit.source: Deploying a self-contained deployment with no third-party dependencies involves creating the project, modifying the project.json file, building, testing, and publishing the app.
trans-unit.target: 部署無任何協力廠商相依性的自封式部署，涉及建立專案、修改 project.json 檔案、建置、測試以及發行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A simple example written in C# illustrates the process.
trans-unit.target: 以 C# 撰寫的簡單範例會說明此程序。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `dotnet` utility from the command line; however, you can also use a development environment, such as Visual Studio or Visual Studio Code, to compile, test, and publish the example.
trans-unit.target: 此範例從命令列使用 `dotnet` 公用程式，但您也可以使用開發環境，例如 Visual Studio 或 Visual Studio Code，來編譯、測試及發行範例。

trans-unit.source: Create a directory for your project, and from the command line, type `dotnet new` to create a new C# console project.
trans-unit.target: 建立專案目錄，並從命令列輸入 `dotnet new` 來建立新的 C# 主控台專案。

trans-unit.source: Open the `Program.cs` file in an editor, and replace the auto-generated code with the following code.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯器中開啟 `Program.cs` 檔案，並以下列程式碼取代自動產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It prompts the user to enter text, and then displays the individual words entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 它會提示使用者輸入文字，然後顯示使用者輸入的個別文字。

trans-unit.source: It uses the regular expression `\w+` to separate the words in the input text.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用規則運算式 `\w+` 分隔輸入文字中的字詞。

trans-unit.source: Open the `project.json` file and in the `frameworks` section, remove the following line:
trans-unit.target: 開啟 `frameworks` 區段的 `project.json` 檔案，移除下行︰

trans-unit.source: The Framework section should appear as follows after you've modified it:
trans-unit.target: 修改它後，Framework 區段應會出現，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: Removing the `"type": "platform"` attribute indicates that the framework is provided as a set of components local to our app, rather than as a system-wide platform package.
trans-unit.target: 移除 `"type": "platform"` 屬性指出 Framework 已提供為應用程式的一組本機元件，而非全系統的平台封裝。

trans-unit.source: Create a `runtimes` section in your `project.json` file that defines the platforms your app targets, and specify the runtime identifier of each platform that you target.
trans-unit.target: 在定義應用程式目標平台的 `project.json` 檔案中建立 `runtimes` 區段，並指定每個目標平台的執行階段識別碼。

trans-unit.source: See [Runtime IDentifier catalog](../rid-catalog.md) for a list of runtime identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行階段識別碼清單，請參閱 [Runtime IDentifier catalog](../rid-catalog.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following `runtimes` section indicates that the app runs on 64-bit Windows 10 operating systems and the 64-bit OS X Version 10.10 operating system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 `runtimes` 區段指出應用程式在 64 位元 Windows 10 作業系統和 64 位元 OS X 版本 10.10 作業系統上執行。

trans-unit.source: Note that you also need to add a comma to separate the `runtimes` section from the previous section.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您也需要加入逗號來分隔 `runtimes` 區段與上一個區段。

trans-unit.source: A complete sample `project.json` file appears later in this section.
trans-unit.target: 本節稍後會提供完整的範例 `project.json` 檔。

trans-unit.source: Run the `dotnet restore` command to restore the dependencies specified in your project.
trans-unit.target: 執行 `dotnet restore` 命令還原專案中指定的相依性。

trans-unit.source: Create debug builds of your app on each of the target platforms by using the `dotnet build` command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `dotnet build` 命令在每個目標平台上建立應用程式的偵錯組建。

trans-unit.source: Unless you specify the runtime identifier you'd like to build, the `dotnet build` command creates a build only for the current system's runtime ID.
trans-unit.target: 除非您指定想要建置的執行階段識別碼，否則 `dotnet build` 命令只會建立目前系統的執行階段識別碼。

trans-unit.source: You can build your app for both target platforms with the commands:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列命令為兩個目標平台建置應用程式︰

trans-unit.source: The debug builds of your app for each platform will be found in the project's `.\bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\<runtime_identifier>` subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個平台的應用程式偵錯組建位於專案的 `.\bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\<runtime_identifier>` 子目錄。

trans-unit.source: After you've debugged and tested the program, you can create the files to be deployed with your app for each platform that it targets by using the `dotnet publish` command for both target platforms as follows:
trans-unit.target: 偵錯並測試完程式之後，您可以對兩個目標平台使用 `dotnet publish` 命令，建立針對每個目標平台要與應用程式一起部署的檔案，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: This creates a release (rather than a debug) version of your app for each target platform.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立每個目標平台的應用程式發行 (而非偵錯) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The resulting files are placed in a subdirectory named `publish` that is in a subdirectory of your project's `.\bin\release\netcoreapp1.0\<runtime_identifier>` subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案會放在名為 `publish` 的子目錄中，位在您專案的 `.\bin\release\netcoreapp1.0\<runtime_identifier>` 子目錄的子目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Note that each subdirectory contains the complete set of files (both your app files and all .NET Core files) needed to launch your app.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，每個子目錄都包含啟動應用程式所需的一組完整檔案 (應用程式檔案和所有的 .NET Core 檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Along with your application's files, the publishing process emits a program database (.pdb) file that contains debugging information about your app.
trans-unit.target: 隨著應用程式檔案一起，發佈程序會發出程式資料庫 (.pdb) 檔案，其中包含應用程式的偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: The file is useful primarily for debugging exceptions; you can choose not to package it with your application's files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案主要用於偵錯例外狀況，您可以選擇應用程式檔案不封裝它。

trans-unit.source: The published files can be deployed in any way you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 您可以任何想要的方式部署已發行的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can package them in a zip file, use a simple `copy` command, or deploy them with any installation package of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用簡單的 `copy` 命令將它們封裝在 zip 檔案中，或與您選擇的任何安裝封裝一起部署。

trans-unit.source: The following is the complete `project.json` file for this project.
trans-unit.target: 下面是此專案的完整 `project.json` 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Deploying a self-contained deployment with third-party dependencies
trans-unit.target: 部署具有協力廠商相依性的自封式部署

trans-unit.source: Deploying a self-contained deployment with one or more third-party dependencies involves adding the third party dependency:
trans-unit.target: 部署具有一或多個協力廠商相依性的自封式部署，涉及新增協力廠商相依性︰

trans-unit.source: Add references to any third-party libraries to the `dependencies` section of your `project.json` file.
trans-unit.target: 將任何協力廠商程式庫參考加入您 `project.json` 檔案的 `dependencies` 區段。

trans-unit.source: The following `dependencies` section uses Json.NET as a third-party library.
trans-unit.target: 下列 `dependencies` 區段會使用 Json.NET 當成協力廠商程式庫。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't already, download the NuGet package containing the third-party dependency to your system.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未如此做，請將包含協力廠商相依性的 NuGet 封裝下載至您的系統。

trans-unit.source: To make the dependency available to your app, execute the `dotnet restore` command after adding the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 請在加入相依性後執行 `dotnet restore` 命令，讓應用程式取得相依性。

trans-unit.source: Because the dependency is resolved out of the local NuGet cache at publish time, it must be available on your system.
trans-unit.target: 因為相依性是在發行時於本機 NuGet 快取外解析，所以必須能在系統中取得。

trans-unit.source: The following is the complete project.json file for this project:
trans-unit.target: 下面是此專案的完整 project.json 檔案：

trans-unit.source: When you deploy your application, any third-party dependencies used in your app are also contained with your application files.
trans-unit.target: 當您部署應用程式時，應用程式中任何協力廠商相依性也包含在應用程式檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Third-party libraries do not already have to be present on the system on which the app is running.
trans-unit.target: 協力廠商程式庫尚未出現在應用程式執行所在的系統上。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can only deploy a self-contained deployment with a third-party library to platforms supported by that library.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您只能將具有協力廠商程式庫的自封式部署，部署到該程式庫支援的平台上。

trans-unit.source: This is similar to having third-party dependencies with native dependencies in your framework-dependent deployment.
trans-unit.target: 這類似在與 Framework 相依的部署中有帶原生相依性的協力廠商相依性。

trans-unit.source: Deploying a self-contained deployment with a smaller footprint
trans-unit.target: 部署使用量較小的自封式部署

trans-unit.source: If the availability of adequate storage space on target systems is likely to be an issue, you can reduce the overall footprint of your app by excluding some system components.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標系統上無法取得足夠的儲存空間，您可以排除某些系統元件，以減少應用程式的整體使用量。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you explicitly define the .NET Core components that your app includes in your project.json file.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以在 project.json 檔案中明確定義應用程式包含的 .NET Core 元件。

trans-unit.source: To create a self-contained deployment with a smaller footprint, start by following the first two steps for creating a self-contained deployment.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立使用量較小的自封式部署，請從建立自封式部署的前兩個步驟開始。

trans-unit.source: Once you've run the `dotnet new` command and added the C# source code to your app, do the following:
trans-unit.target: 一旦執行了 `dotnet new` 命令，並將 C# 原始程式碼加入到您的應用程式中，請執行下列動作︰

trans-unit.source: Open the `project.json` file and replace the `frameworks` section with the following:
trans-unit.target: 開啟 `project.json` 檔案，並以下列內容取代 `frameworks` 區段：

trans-unit.source: This does two things:
trans-unit.target: 這會執行兩項作業︰

trans-unit.source: It indicates that, instead of using the entire `netcoreapp1.0` framework, which includes .NET Core CLR, the .NET Core Library, and a number of other system components, our app uses only the .NET Standard Library.
trans-unit.target: 它會指出，而不是使用整個 `netcoreapp1.0` Framework，哪些包括 .NET Core CLR、.NET Core 程式庫和幾個其他系統元件，而我們的應用程式只使用 .NET 標準庫。

trans-unit.source: By removing the `"type": "platform"` attribute, it indicates that the framework is provided as a set of components local to our app, rather than as a system-wide platform package.
trans-unit.target: 藉由移除 `"type": "platform"` 屬性，指出 Framework 已提供為應用程式的一組本機元件，而非全系統的平台封裝。

trans-unit.source: Replace the `dependencies` section with the following:
trans-unit.target: 以下列內容取代 `dependencies` 區段：

trans-unit.source: This defines the system components used by our app.
trans-unit.target: 這會定義我們應用程式所使用的系統元件。

trans-unit.source: The system components packaged with our app include the .NET Standard Library, the .NET Core runtime, and the .NET Core host.
trans-unit.target: 與我們的應用程式一起封裝的系統元件，包括 .NET 標準程式庫、.NET Core 執行階段和 .NET Core 主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This produces a self-contained deployment with a smaller footprint.
trans-unit.target: 這會產生使用量較小的自封式部署。

trans-unit.source: As you did in the [Deploying a simple self-contained deployment](#simpleSelf) example, create a `runtimes` section in your `project.json` file that defines the platforms your app targets and specify the runtime identifier of each platform that you target.
trans-unit.target: 如您在[部署簡單的自封式部署](#simpleSelf)範例中所做的那樣，在定義應用程式目標平台的 `project.json` 檔案中建立 `runtimes` 區段，並指定每個目標平台的執行階段識別碼。

trans-unit.source: See [Runtime IDentifier catalog](../rid-catalog.md) for a list of runtime identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行階段識別碼清單，請參閱 [Runtime IDentifier catalog](../rid-catalog.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following `runtimes` section indicates that the app runs on 64-bit Windows 10 operating systems and the 64-bit OS X Version 10.10 operating system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 `runtimes` 區段指出應用程式在 64 位元 Windows 10 作業系統和 64 位元 OS X 版本 10.10 作業系統上執行。

trans-unit.source: Note that you also need to add a comma to separate the `runtimes` section from the previous section.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您也需要加入逗號來分隔 `runtimes` 區段與上一個區段。

trans-unit.source: A complete sample `project.json` file appears later in this section.
trans-unit.target: 本節稍後會提供完整的範例 `project.json` 檔。

trans-unit.source: Run the `dotnet restore` command to restore the dependencies specified in your project.
trans-unit.target: 執行 `dotnet restore` 命令還原專案中指定的相依性。

trans-unit.source: Create debug builds of your app on each of the target platforms by using the `dotnet build` command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `dotnet build` 命令在每個目標平台上建立應用程式的偵錯組建。

trans-unit.source: Unless you specify the runtime identifier you'd like to build, the `dotnet build` command creates a build only for the current system's runtime ID.
trans-unit.target: 除非您指定想要建置的執行階段識別碼，否則 `dotnet build` 命令只會建立目前系統的執行階段識別碼。

trans-unit.source: You can build your app for both target platforms with the commands:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列命令為兩個目標平台建置應用程式︰

trans-unit.source: After you've debugged and tested the program, you can create the files to be deployed with your app for each platform that it targets by using the `dotnet publish` command for both target platforms as follows:
trans-unit.target: 偵錯並測試完程式之後，您可以對兩個目標平台使用 `dotnet publish` 命令，建立針對每個目標平台要與應用程式一起部署的檔案，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: This creates a release (rather than a debug) version of your app for each target platform.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立每個目標平台的應用程式發行 (而非偵錯) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The resulting files are placed in a subdirectory named `publish` that is in a subdirectory of your project's `.\bin\release\netstandard1.6\<runtime_identifier>` subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案會放在名為 `publish` 的子目錄中，位在您專案的 `.\bin\release\netstandard1.6\<runtime_identifier>` 子目錄的子目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Note that each subdirectory contains the complete set of files (both your app files and all .NET Core files) needed to launch your app.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，每個子目錄都包含啟動應用程式所需的一組完整檔案 (應用程式檔案和所有的 .NET Core 檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Along with your application's files, the publishing process emits a program database (.pdb) file that contains debugging information about your app.
trans-unit.target: 隨著應用程式檔案一起，發佈程序會發出程式資料庫 (.pdb) 檔案，其中包含應用程式的偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: The file is useful primarily for debugging exceptions; you can choose not to package it with your application's files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案主要用於偵錯例外狀況，您可以選擇應用程式檔案不封裝它。

trans-unit.source: The published files can be deployed in any way you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 您可以任何想要的方式部署已發行的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can package them in a zip file, use a simple `copy` command, or deploy them with any installation package of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用簡單的 `copy` 命令將它們封裝在 zip 檔案中，或與您選擇的任何安裝封裝一起部署。

trans-unit.source: The following is the complete `project.json` file for this project.
trans-unit.target: 下面是此專案的完整 `project.json` 檔案。
